abstract.para: You can add test client and user for FreeRADIUS server.

procedure.step:
You must add a test client and user to test the authentication The client is a client of the RADIUS server, such as a wireless access point or switch.
The machines that can use the devices of the FreeRADIUS server are defined in client.conf file. You can edit the client configuration file vi /etc/raddb/client.conf. A test client, client localhost, is provided in /etc/raddb/client.conf, with the secret testing123.

Configure users in the authorize file, /etc/raddb/mods-config/files/authorize Open /etc/raddb/mods-config/files/authorize and uncomment the following lines: bob Cleartext-Password := "hello" Reply-Message := "Hello, %{User-Name}"
